channel.title: Closed Captions Update [Hazard Course Captions Available(Works only for Mod Version of Black Mesa)]
channel.description:
Hi everyone. The Black Mesa Hazard Course captions are now available! If there are any issues regarding compatibility with these versions, please let the PSR and I know immediately.
[COLOR='Red'][b][u]Status: Version 1.32[/u][/b][/size]
[b][u]Patched Maps (Bases for Closed Captions Updates)[/u][/b]
[url='https://www.dropbox.com/s/aoe4fzn8eizu553/Patched%20Maps%20(Stock%20Base).7z']Patched Maps (Stock Base)[/url]
[url='https://www.dropbox.com/s/7xo6icge19cvxzd/Patched%20Maps%20(STU%20Base).7z']Patched Maps (Surface Tension Uncut Base)[/url]
[b][u]Captions Update for Stock Base:[/u][/b]
1. [url='https://www.dropbox.com/s/gu70497atj4isd2/Closed%20Captions%20Update%20(Stock%20Version).zip']Stock Captions[/url]
2. [url='https://www.dropbox.com/s/e10nmtii5km2paj/Closed%20Captions%20Update%20(Uplink%20Version).zip']Uplink Captions[/url]
3. [url='https://www.dropbox.com/s/qv24p5me4n09yew/Closed%20Captions%20Update%20(HC%20Version).zip?dl=0']Hazard Course Captions[/url]
4. [url='https://www.dropbox.com/s/ctpubemw47i6fjk/Closed%20Captions%20Update%20(HC%20%26%20Uplink%20Version).zip?dl=0']Uplink and Hazard Course Captions[/url]
[b][u]Captions Update for Surface Tension Uncut Base:[/u][/b]
1. [url='https://www.dropbox.com/s/vh2k4c41j8n65f0/Closed%20Captions%20Update%20(STU%20Version).zip']Surface Tension Uncut Captions[/url]
2. [url='https://www.dropbox.com/s/9ppyz6mnnwxbj5n/Closed%20Captions%20Update%20(STU%20%26%20Uplink%20Version).zip']Surface Tension Uncut and Uplink Captions[/url]
3. [url='https://www.dropbox.com/s/8uqd9zypwvskesz/Closed%20Captions%20Update%20(HC%20%26%20STU%20Version).zip?dl=0']Surface Tension Uncut and Hazard Course Captions[/url]
4. [url='https://www.dropbox.com/s/uin0d5nciohr9ht/Closed%20Captions%20Update%20(HC%2C%20STU%2C%20%26%20Uplink%20Version).zip?dl=0']Surface Tension Uncut, Uplink and Hazard Course Captions[/url]
The bases above include patched maps for the Inbound chapter (c0a0a - c0a0c), the last On a Rail map (Patched version of TextFAMGUY1's map is also included in case you have OaR Uncut installed), map c2a5g for Surface Tension, the first Forget About Freeman map to resolve captions bug (ST Uncut Base uses patched version of TextFAMGUY1's map), a game_sounds_manifest.txt file (one of them modified to be compatible with Surface Tension Uncut), and a game_sounds_ambient_generic_cc.txt file for the scripts. The captions updates include more corrections and fixes for the captions and new captions for the VOX lines. Several of them also include a scenes.image file to make more than one mod work properly.
Before installing one of the 2 bases, you will need to backup the Inbound maps (c0a0a - c0a0c), the final On a Rail map c2a2c, map c2a5g for Surface Tension, the first Forget about Freeman map in the "maps" folder, and the game_sounds_manifest file. Once you backed all of these up, you can extract either version of the bases to the "BMS" folder. After that, backup your closecaption_english files in the "resource" folder, download one of the versions of the Closed Captions Updates and extract any version of them to the "BMS" folder. [b]**[/b]
If you have downloaded On a Rail Uncut, you will have to locate the bm_c2a2c and folder named graphs in the BMS folder. Move both of these into the maps folder. You should be prompted to replace a couple files or so. Click yes.
[COLOR='Red'][b]** If you're planning to download any mods for Black Mesa, please install them into your BMS folder before doing this.[/b]
[u][b]Known Issues:[/b][/u]
[s]1. Several of the captions in the Inbound chapter and the final On a Rail map fade out before the line is completely heard.[/s]
[b][s]Inbound[/s][/b]
[s]1. In map C0A0C, this [url='https://i.imgur.com/hbxzYHi.jpg']caption[/url] fades out at 'biotechnology"[/s] [s]2. In the same map, this [url='https://i.imgur.com/QrCYv53.jpg']caption[/url] fades out around "contact your radiation safety officer immediately"[/s] [s]3. In map C0A0B, this [url='https://i.imgur.com/DCigOpk.jpg']caption[/url] fades just after the dialogue is finished. It should fade out a couple seconds [b]after[/b] the dialogue ends.[/s] [s]4. In the same map, this [url='https://i.imgur.com/eXZ3jpn.jpg']caption[/url] fades out at "electrified rails"[/s]
[b][s]On a Rail[/s][/b]
[s]1. In the [url='https://i.imgur.com/3fs9bRp.jpg']last On a Rail map[/url], this caption fades out after the HECU VOX says "remaining"[/s] [s]2. In the [url='https://i.imgur.com/SPzkx3e.jpg']same map[/url], this caption fades out after the HECU VOX says "8..."[/s]
[s]I don't know how to fix this issue as all I can do with Source SDK is edit the captions and compile them. If anybody knows how to fix this issue, please let me know. I really want this mod to be as polished as it can.[/s]
[s]All of the screenshots are what the captions are before they fade out early.[/s]
Edit: Fixed as of [b]v1.31[/b][/size]
[u][b]Special Thanks:[/b][/u] Valve - For creating the Half-Life universe. Black Mesa Devs - For creating the Black Mesa game. BM Translation Community - For patching the Inbound maps, the last On a Rail map, the last Surface Tension map (stock version), and the first Forget About Freeman map to get the captions to work properly and also adding the VOX lines from Anomalous Materials to On a Rail. TextFAMGUY1- For creating Surface Tension and On a Rail Uncut. Ulrik - For helping Text fix the Forget About Freeman captions Hezus- For creating the Uplink Mod. Dadster - For creating the first version of the Closed Captions Update Mod. Kyruma - For helping Dadster out with some questions he had. TSL16b - For finding a solution to fixing the issue where captions in the Inbound chapter and the final On a Rail map fade out before the lines are completely heard.

item.title: Closed Captions Update [Hazard Course Captions Available(Works only for Mod Version of Black Mesa)]
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
If you’re playing the game with Hazard Course with Uplink or playing it with those 2 and Surface Tension Uncut, please download them again immediately. The bms_english.txt file (which contains the HUD hints) was outdated in those versions of the captions update. I’m sorry for not properly updating that file sooner.

Read full topic

item.title: Closed Captions Update [Hazard Course Captions Available(Works only for Mod Version of Black Mesa)]
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
Alright. With the Black Mesa Hazard Course officially out, new versions of the Closed Caption Update are here. If you are planning to play this with Surface Tension Uncut, Uplink, or both, please follow these steps.

  1. Install the Hazard Course along with either STU, Uplink, or both.

  2. Download and extract one of the patched maps into your BMS folder. If you do not want to play Surface Tension Uncut with the Hazard Course, download the stock version of the patched maps. Otherwise, go ahead and download the STU version of the patched maps.

  3. Download one of the versions of the Closed Captions. If you have HC and STU installed, click on here. If you have HC and Uplink installed, click on here. If you have all 3 of the mods I’ve mentioned installed, go ahead and click here.[/size]

Read full topic
item.source: Closed Captions Update [Hazard Course Captions Available(Works only for Mod Version of Black Mesa)]

item.title: Closed Captions Update [Hazard Course Captions Available(Works only for Mod Version of Black Mesa)]
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
Closed Captions Update v1.31 is here![/size][/size]

[/size]
Hi everyone. It’s been a long time since I updated this. For almost 2 years, I never knew how to fix an issue with several lines where certain Inbound and On a Rail captions (the last map to be specific) would fade out before you finish hearing them. Just recently, [/size]TSL16b told me that there’s a working command called len:X which is used to keep subtitles on the screen as long as I want it to. Thanks to him, this issue is now gone. [/size]
[/size]
[/size]
[COLOR=‘Blue’]Note: If you never installed the captions mod before, you will need to download either the Stock Base or the Surface Tension Uncut Base depending on whether or not you have mods like Surface Tension Uncut).[/size][/size][/size][/size]

Read full topic
item.source: Closed Captions Update [Hazard Course Captions Available(Works only for Mod Version of Black Mesa)]

item.title: Closed Captions Update [Hazard Course Captions Available(Works only for Mod Version of Black Mesa)]
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
TSL16b:

A few days ago I discovered a working len:X command, that can be used in subtitle text. It’s necessary if we want the subtitle stay on screen for longer than 30 seconds. Just set the desired duration in seconds (replace X to a number greater than 30, that is). See the code below.

"VO_inbound_tram.tram_06_pleasekeep_wav" "<len:32><I>Please keep your limbs inside the train at all times. Do not attempt to open the doors until the train has come to a complete halt at the station platform. In the event of an emergency, passengers are to remain seated and await further instruction. If it is necessary to exit the train, disabled personnel should be evacuated first. Please stay away from electrified rails and proceed to an emergency station until assistance arrives." "VO_inbound_tram.tram_07_areminder_wav" "<len:36><I>A reminder to all Black Mesa personnel: Regular radiation and biohazard screenings are a requirement of continued employment in the Black Mesa Research Facility. Missing a scheduled urinalysis or radiation check-up is grounds for immediate termination. If you feel you have been exposed to radioactive or other hazardous materials in the course of your duties, contact your radiation safety officer immediately. Work safe. Work smart. Your future depends on it." "VO_inbound_tram.tram_08_doyou_wav" "<len:38><I>Do you have a friend or relative who would make a valuable addition to the Black Mesa team? Immediate openings are available in the areas of Materials Handling and Low Clearance Security. Please contact Black Mesa personnel for further information. If you have an associate with a background in the areas of theoretical physics, biotechnology, or other high tech disciplines, please contact our civilian recruiting team. The Black Mesa Facility is an equal opportunity employer."

Thanks! I’ll try that out.

Read full topic
item.source: Closed Captions Update [Hazard Course Captions Available(Works only for Mod Version of Black Mesa)]

item.title: Closed Captions Update [Hazard Course Captions Available(Works only for Mod Version of Black Mesa)]
item.dc:creator: TSL16b
item.description:
PCGameCrazy:

Known Issues:

  1. Several of the captions in the Inbound chapter and the final On a Rail map fade out before the line is completely heard.

Inbound

  1. In map C0A0C, this caption fades out at 'biotechnology"
  2. In the same map, this caption fades out around “contact your radiation safety officer immediately”
  3. In map C0A0B, this caption fades just after the dialogue is finished. It should fade out a couple seconds after the dialogue ends.
  4. In the same map, this caption fades out at “electrified rails”

On a Rail

  1. In the last On a Rail map, this caption fades out after the HECU VOX says “remaining”
  2. In the same map, this caption fades out after the HECU VOX says “8…”

I don’t know how to fix this issue as all I can do with Source SDK is edit the captions and compile them. If anybody knows how to fix this issue, please let me know. I really want this mod to be as polished as it can.

A few days ago I discovered a working len:X command, that can be used in subtitle text. It’s necessary if we want the subtitle stay on screen for longer than 30 seconds. Just set the desired duration in seconds (replace X to a number greater than 30, that is). See the code below.

"VO_inbound_tram.tram_06_pleasekeep_wav" "<len:32><I>Please keep your limbs inside the train at all times. Do not attempt to open the doors until the train has come to a complete halt at the station platform. In the event of an emergency, passengers are to remain seated and await further instruction. If it is necessary to exit the train, disabled personnel should be evacuated first. Please stay away from electrified rails and proceed to an emergency station until assistance arrives." "VO_inbound_tram.tram_07_areminder_wav" "<len:36><I>A reminder to all Black Mesa personnel: Regular radiation and biohazard screenings are a requirement of continued employment in the Black Mesa Research Facility. Missing a scheduled urinalysis or radiation check-up is grounds for immediate termination. If you feel you have been exposed to radioactive or other hazardous materials in the course of your duties, contact your radiation safety officer immediately. Work safe. Work smart. Your future depends on it." "VO_inbound_tram.tram_08_doyou_wav" "<len:38><I>Do you have a friend or relative who would make a valuable addition to the Black Mesa team? Immediate openings are available in the areas of Materials Handling and Low Clearance Security. Please contact Black Mesa personnel for further information. If you have an associate with a background in the areas of theoretical physics, biotechnology, or other high tech disciplines, please contact our civilian recruiting team. The Black Mesa Facility is an equal opportunity employer."

Read full topic

item.title: Closed Captions Update [Hazard Course Captions Available(Works only for Mod Version of Black Mesa)]
item.dc:creator: Alex_Wolfenstein97
item.description:
Awsome mod you should make subtitles for the unofficial XEN mod as well, for the gman and for the nihilanth, get 0.1, install it, and then install 0.11 on top of 0.1 -DELETE the C2A5H from the SCENES folder of the mod and make your own scenes.image with sourcesdk, if you have UPLINK installed, check the chapter_manifest.txt and re add it in there, do the same for the bms_english.txt file…

get the mod here
https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-xen-improved-maps-from-half-life/downloads

item.title: Closed Captions Update [Hazard Course Captions Available(Works only for Mod Version of Black Mesa)]
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
[COLOR=‘Red’]Closed Captions Update v1.29 is now out![/SIZE]

This update includes captions from the B1 map. In order for the captions for that map to work properly, you will need to download one of the versions of the patched maps first and then download the captions fix for what mods you have installed in your BMS folder. After you extract the patched maps to your BMS folder, make sure the graphs folder and the map files (bm_c2a2b1 and bm_c2a2c) are moved to the BMS folder’s maps subfolder (this is for anyone who’s playing On a Rail Uncut). After that, you can extract one of the caption fixes to your BMS folder.

[COLOR=‘Red’]Update: Hotfix for v1.29![/SIZE]

If you already downloaded one of the versions of the patched maps, please redownload it. I realized that I made the sound for the dialogue much louder than it was in the original version of Text’s B1 map. This should be fixed now.

[COLOR=‘Red’]One more thing![/SIZE]

Apparently, the stock version of the captions fix didn’t have the sci_eli_notellingwhatdanger01 reverted back like the other 3 versions. If you’re using the stock version of the captions fix, please redownload it.

Read full topic
item.source: Closed Captions Update [Hazard Course Captions Available(Works only for Mod Version of Black Mesa)]

item.title: Closed Captions Update [Hazard Course Captions Available(Works only for Mod Version of Black Mesa)]
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
Open Source Forever:

How come there’s no “On a Rail Uncut” version of this captions fix?

I changed up how the captions fix works by having 2 separate downloads. One download would be the Stock and Surface Tension Uncut versions of the patched maps (which also includes the patched On a Rail Uncut C map if you have that mod installed) and the other would be the captions fix for whatever mods you have installed. This is done so that I don’t have to make an On a Rail Uncut version of the captions fix. You’ll need to download both of them in order for the captions mod to work properly.

Now that I think of it, I could add a patched version of Text’s B1 map to the Stock and Surface Tension Uncut versions of the patched maps so that I can get the captions for the “Shoot him in the face!” scene to show up.

Read full topic
item.source: Closed Captions Update [Hazard Course Captions Available(Works only for Mod Version of Black Mesa)]

item.title: Closed Captions Update [Hazard Course Captions Available(Works only for Mod Version of Black Mesa)]
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
Hello everyone. It’s been a long time. How have you been? I’ve been really busy being dead… Just kidding. I’m fine.

I’ve got some good news: After one year since bringing the first version of the Closed Captions Update, I’ve finally fixed an issue with the grd01_idle_physicstorocketscience lines! These lines are for the following dialogue in the end of the Power Up chapter: “Man… Theoretical physics. And now rocket science. Good thing one of us was hitting the books while the other one was chasing tail. Or… ya know… just playing computer games.”

After almost 5 months of no updates,

[COLOR=‘Red’]Closed Captions Update v1.28 is finally here![/SIZE]

Read full topic
item.source: Closed Captions Update [Hazard Course Captions Available(Works only for Mod Version of Black Mesa)]

item.title: Closed Captions Update [Hazard Course Captions Available(Works only for Mod Version of Black Mesa)]
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
Sometime ago, Dadster once told me that people would be less likely to download every update due to small updates with big file downloads. With this in mind, I came up with a solution to prevent having to download the same patched maps over and over again for each update.

Two of the versions of my mod (Stock and Surface Tension Uncut versions) are now the bases of the captions update mod. You need to download that and one of the caption updates for one of the versions of the bases. If you any mods installed (or more than one if you’re using the STU Base version) however, don’t worry. You will have the option to download a captions updates specific to the mods you have installed.

You may have noticed that 4 versions of the caption updates that have Hazard Course mentioned don’t have any links to them. The reason is because the Hazard Course mod is not out yet. When that mod is out, I’ll release the other updates.

Edit: I just realized that I need to put in small captions updates for stock and STU version like the others. Will remedy this very soon.

Edit 2: Fixed. My post is edited for the small change I made to this format.

Read full topic
item.source: Closed Captions Update [Hazard Course Captions Available(Works only for Mod Version of Black Mesa)]
